sourcesContent:
import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData" export default function Post({post}) { const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id === post.userId); return (
{user.username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like}
{post.comment} comments
) }
